titles.title: To limit the authority of the Small Business Administration to facilitate access to voter registration, and for other purposes.
To limit the authority of the Small Business Administration to facilitate access to voter registration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
